thread.title: In Anambra: Cleric found dead after night vigil
thread.title_full: In Anambra: Cleric found dead after night vigil

author: Vwovwe Egbo
title: In Anambra: Cleric found dead after night vigil
text: Tweet The General Overseer of Jesus Covenant Bible Ministries was reportedly found dead inside a gutter on Friday, February 3, 2017. The deceased, Pastor Ime Etim , is said to have been on his way back from a private vigil on Thursday night when he was murdered. the body was found in the drainage behind Fidelity Bank Plc, close to Nwayi-Imo bus stop. The deceased was stripped down to his boxers, tied up and gagged by his assailants before his murder. May his soul rest in peace. Tweet Author
